content.rendered:
v0.8.0 b3 is a straight old fashion bugfix, including the Javascript errors reported here.

Grab it at your local WordPress repository >

excerpt.rendered: v0.8.0 b3 is a straight old fashion bugfix, including the Javascript errors reported on our forum.
